_comment: FFU Builder Version Configuration - Single source of truth for all versioning

versioningPolicy.majorBump: Breaking changes to configs/scripts OR major milestones
versioningPolicy.minorBump: New user-facing features OR significant improvements
versioningPolicy.patchBump: Bug fixes OR any subcomponent version change

FFU.Common.description: Core logging, process execution, shared utilities, messaging queue integration, and signature compatibility with FFU.Messaging

FFU.Common.Logging.description: Structured logging with levels, JSON output, session correlation

FFUUI.Core.description: WPF UI framework with VMware network settings (NetworkType/NicType dropdowns), bridged network IP auto-detection, hypervisor selection, VM shutdown timeout

FFU.Core.description: Core configuration, session tracking, credential security, schema validation, PowerShell best practices, WIM mount error handling, background job compatible output, build cancellation helper

FFU.Constants.description: Centralized configuration constants with dynamic path resolution - deprecated static properties removed

FFU.ADK.description: Windows ADK validation and installation, background job compatible output

FFU.Drivers.description: OEM driver download - enhanced diagnostics, BITS fallback, proxy/firewall block detection

FFU.Imaging.description: DISM operations and FFU creation - VMware VHD flush fix ensures unattend.xml persists to disk

FFU.Media.description: WinPE media creation - fixed empty VMwareDrivers folder detection, ForceVMwareDriverDownload support

FFU.Updates.description: Windows Update catalog and MSU handling - PowerShell 7 expand.exe fix

FFU.VM.description: VM lifecycle management for FFU Builder - Hyper-V and VMware support via FFU.Hypervisor

FFU.Messaging.description: Thread-safe messaging for UI/background job communication

FFU.Preflight.description: Enhanced WimMount failure detection - driver integrity check, altitude conflict detection, EDR/security software blocking detection with targeted remediation

FFU.Hypervisor.description: Hypervisor abstraction layer - VMware network type (bridged/nat/hostonly) and NIC type (e1000e/vmxnet3/e1000) now configurable via VMConfiguration

FFU.BuildTest.description: Build testing and verification with elevated execution support (Start-FFUBuildListener, Invoke-FFUBuildElevated)

FFU.ConfigMigration.description: Configuration file migration and schema versioning
